item.title: GSoC: Sound Open Firmware
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Setting up the hardware Physical setup TFTP server NFS server & rootfs U-Boot configuration Modifying the software Dynamic loading Actual implementation “Fixing” a variable leak in topology generation Making Intel IPC stream operations more generic Introducing fragment elapsed notification API Final conclusions SOF Linux Kernel SOF Project Introduction After wanting to work on an Open Source project for a long time, an opportunity finally presented itself.
